physicalTable.name: XXMSC_ORDER_TYPES_VIEW
physicalTable.description: SQL query used to produce the Disco report "XX: Planning Demand vs Supply"

physicalColumns.name: ITEM_UNIT_COST
physicalColumns.description:
Item Unit Cost (Org specific) using 
xxinv_utils_pkg.get_item_cost(Item Id, Org Id)

physicalColumns.name: MTL_INVENTORY_ITEM_ID
physicalColumns.description: Inventory Item Id for the MTL_SYSTEM_ITEMS

physicalColumns.name: ORG_CODE_MSC
physicalColumns.description: Organization code for the ASCP module

physicalColumns.name: ITEM_MATERIAL_COST
physicalColumns.description: Item's Material Cost Element (Org specific) using xxinv_utils_pkg.get_item_material_cost(Item Id, Org Id)

physicalColumns.name: ORDER_TYPE_NEW
physicalColumns.description: If Demand based quantity, then 'Demand'; Else select "Order Type Text" column for Supply based quantities

physicalColumns.name: EXT_ITEM_COST
physicalColumns.description:
Quantity * Item Unit Cost (Org specific) using 
xxinv_utils_pkg.get_item_cost(Item Id, Org Id)

physicalColumns.name: SOURCING_RULE_NAME
physicalColumns.description: Supplier Name coming from xxpo_utils_pkg.get_item_sourcing_rule (org id, item id)
